contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Counsel’s application to withdraw from further representation of appellant in this case is denied. Anders v. California, 386 U.S. 738, 87 S.Ct. 1396, 18 L.Ed.2d 493 (1967); Commonwealth v. Greer, 455 Pa. 106, 314 A.2d 513 (1974); Commonwealth v. Baker, 429 Pa. 209, 239 A.2d 201 (1968).
Counsel is directed to file promptly a brief in accordance with Anders, Greer and Baker, supra.
